Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SEC_OBJ_TYPE_PERM_INS_SP" ( P_OBJECT_TYPE IN VARCHAR2, P_PERMISSION_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1 ) IS V_ID NUMBER; BEGIN SELECT CMN_SEC_OBJ_TYPE_PERM_S1.NEXTVAL INTO V_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_SEC_OBJ_TYPE_PERM ( ID, OBJECT_TYPE_ID, PERMISSION_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) SELECT V_ID, L.ID, P.ID, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY FROM CMN_LOOKUPS L, CMN_SEC_PERMISSIONS P WHERE L.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'SEC_OBJECT_TYPE' AND L.LOOKUP_CODE = P_OBJECT_TYPE AND P.PERMISSION_CODE = P_PERMISSION_CODE AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CMN_SEC_OBJ_TYPE_PERM SOTP WHERE SOTP.OBJECT_TYPE_ID = L.ID AND SOTP.PERMISSION_ID = P.ID); END;
